name: Card Retrieve
description:
Submission of Weekly Game Jams week 195

Game Description
Throw boomerang-style cards and survive the endless onslaught of aggressive ghosts! Card Retrieve is a top-down endless horde swarming roguelike where cards return after being thrown like boomerangs and retrieving them up will grant the player boons that affect the battle.

Features

  • Red Cards when caught midair will grant player damage increase.
  • Red Cards when picked up from the floor reduces damage.
  • Green cards when picked up from the floor heals the player by 2 points.

Status
under development

Credits

TopDown Engine from More Mountains https://moremountains.com/
Music from https://maou.audio/
